🏡

macOS

  1. Yabai: tiling window manager
  2. Skhd: hotkey daemon for macos
  3. Spaceid: to display space or desktop number on topbar
  4. Raycast: application launcher with fancy features such as sticky note, clipboard history, snippets, and extendable plugins (you can create your own plugins)
  5. Obsidian: note taking app with tons of available plugins.
  6. Ghostty: terminal emulator
  7. Zen: firefox-based browser
